sentences: Gudrun Lund (22 April 1930 â€“ 14 January 2020) was a Danish composer.
She was born in Aalborg and studied music, German and English at the Copenhagen Conservatory.
After graduating, she took a position teaching at the Copenhagen Day and Evening College of Education (KDAS).
Lund began composing in 1975 at the age of 45.
In 1983-4 she studied at Hartt College of Music,  University of Hartford in West Hartford, Connecticut, USA.
